# your code goes here
import math
t=int(input())
a=[]
i=1
j=0
for j in range (t):
    n=int(input())
    a=map(int, raw_input().split())
    a.sort()
    b=[0]*10005
    for i in range(n):
        if(a[i]==a[i-1]):
            b[a[i-1]]=b[a[i-1]]+1
        else:
             b[a[i]]=b[a[i]]+1
    ans=max(b)
    print str(b.index(ans))+" " + str(ans)
